text: #COVID19: Trained 🦮  ⁦@HelsinkiAirport⁩ sniffs out #coronavirus infected people with “94% success rate.” Cancers can smell of Woodsy Fungus, TB of Stale Beer, Parkinson’s of deer musk; what is odorant metabolite of #SARSCoV2 infected cells? 🗣🐕‍🦺👃🏽🤷🏻‍♂️ https://t.co/7d4u5vf3cR

neither the patient nor the HCW knows whether the #COVID19vaccine or a placebo is being administered.  Ideally, the placebo should look and ‘act’ like the real vaccine in every possible sense except for its ability to elicit the response being evaluated. (2/n)

#COVID19 vaccines:@virusninja bumps into @VirusWhisperer, the smart one🥋says “You know what would be a ‘real’ placebo? Make the same mRNA (vaccine) with the ATG codon mutated!” 👏 This is considered small talk for geeky virologists🤓 In Double-Blind Placebo-Controlled trials 1/n

#COVID19 Rx: Kudos to ⁦@LillyPad⁩ for trialing #MAb Rx in patients with mild-moderate disease; “defensive medicine” often trial therapies on the sickest patients where it is more unlikely to show an effect. For #COVID19, decreasing VL early is key.👏 https://t.co/FJtx9llXtg
Asked to review for a one word journal: “Since this is COVID-19, we would need your  review in 5 DAYS.” AYFKM?!

This wrong. Period. For starters, CLEAR examples of ASYMPTOMATIC virus spread exist: (1) ~50% of the population are CMV+, *most* people infected with CMV exhibit no symptoms; (2) sexually transmitted HIV in the latent/early chronic phase (How else did HIV become a pandemic?)
